remarks: Two group sums over a direct product that give the same value are equal as functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)
statement:
eldprdi.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
eldprdi.w $e |- W = { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | h finSupp .0. } $.
eldprdi.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
eldprdi.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
eldprdi.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. W ) $.
dprdf11.4 $e |- ( ph -> H e. W ) $.
dprdf11 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( G gsum F ) = ( G gsum H ) <-> F = H ) ) $.
$d .0. h $.

$d H h $.
